# Purpose
Apply Index Class before running other index dependent calculations.

# Official Taxa Files
URL for Index Class criteria is provided below.

Index Class criteria File on 
<a href="https://github.com/leppott/BioMonTools_SupportFiles/tree/main/data/index_class" target = "_blank">GitHub</a>.

# File Inputs
Any file can be run  but it is suggested the file be ready for use in
`BioMonTools` or `BCGcalc` functions.  That is, it has the columns:

* Index_Name

    + Unique taxa name

* Index_Class

    + Count of taxa individuals
    
* SampleID

    + Unique sample identifier.  Includes any replicate/duplicate information.
    
* Other Optional Columns needed to discern Index Class.  These are dependent 
upon the Index Name and Index Class

    + For example, station, date, latitude, longitude, elevation, gradient, etc.
    
The user will be required to identify the basic fields in their file in the
select boxes.  The select boxes will contain the columns names of the user file 
that was already uploaded.

# Other
The Index_Class column will be updated according to the criteria.
